RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the department: United States Department of Homeland Security
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.DHS: United States Department of Homeland Security

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: conducted a vehicle stop and was involved in the arrest of Defendants RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Department of Homeland Sec: received information regarding attempted alien smuggling events; conducted interviews at the Freer immigration checkpoint; involved in the prosecution of individuals and bears the burden of proving that stops were constitutional
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.white Malibu sedan: vehicle involved in the incident, associated with defendant RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.black Dodge pickup truck: vehicle involved in the incident, associated with defendant IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.
